hooks.formula: Wait until you see what {topic} does at the end
examples: Wait until you see what this AI does at the end
Wait until you see what luxury brands do at the end

hooks.formula: POV: you just found out about {topic}
examples: POV: you just found out about this tech hack
POV: you just found out about this news story

hooks.formula: Everyone is wrong about {topic}. Here is why.
examples: Everyone is wrong about AI safety. Here is why.
Everyone is wrong about this news story. Here is why.

hooks.formula: STOP SCROLLING. {topic} just changed everything.
examples: STOP SCROLLING. This AI breakthrough just changed everything.
STOP SCROLLING. This news just changed everything.

hooks.formula: 3 things about {topic} that will blow your mind
examples: 3 things about this tech that will blow your mind
3 things about luxury cars that will blow your mind

hooks.formula: {topic} before vs after hits different
examples: AI art before vs after hits different
This makeover before vs after hits different

hooks.formula: The story of {topic} nobody tells you
examples: The story of this brand nobody tells you
The story of this tech founder nobody tells you

hooks.formula: Why is nobody talking about {topic}?
examples: Why is nobody talking about this AI feature?
Why is nobody talking about this news story?

hooks.formula: I can't believe {topic} is real
examples: I can't believe this AI feature is real
I can't believe this luxury item is real

hooks.formula: Only 1% of people know this about {topic}
examples: Only 1% of people know this about AI
Only 1% of people know this about luxury brands

hooks.formula: This {topic} trend is getting out of hand
examples: This AI trend is getting out of hand
This luxury trend is getting out of hand

hooks.formula: If you use {topic}, you need to see this
examples: If you use ChatGPT, you need to see this
If you use this app, you need to see this

hooks.formula: {topic} is not what you think
examples: This news story is not what you think
This luxury brand is not what you think

hooks.formula: POV: {topic} but make it unhinged
examples: POV: tech bro but make it unhinged
POV: luxury shopping but make it unhinged

hooks.formula: The {topic} nobody asked for but everyone needs
examples: The AI feature nobody asked for but everyone needs
The luxury item nobody asked for but everyone needs

hooks.formula: Tell me you love {topic} without telling me you love {topic}
examples: Tell me you love tech without telling me you love tech
Tell me you love luxury without telling me you love luxury

hooks.formula: When {topic} hits different at 3am
examples: When this news hits different at 3am
When this memory hits different at 3am

hooks.formula: The {topic} iceberg explained
examples: The AI iceberg explained
The luxury brand iceberg explained

hooks.formula: You're using {topic} wrong. Here's how to fix it.
examples: You're using AI wrong. Here's how to fix it.
You're using this app wrong. Here's how to fix it.

hooks.formula: This {topic} gave me chills
examples: This story gave me chills
This moment gave me chills

hooks.formula: Like and subscribe if {topic} blew your mind
examples: Like and subscribe if this AI blew your mind
Like and subscribe if this fact blew your mind

hooks.formula: Watch till the end for {topic}
examples: Watch till the end for the plot twist
Watch till the end for the reveal

hooks.formula: The {topic} era is here and I'm here for it
examples: The AI era is here and I'm here for it
The comeback era is here and I'm here for it

hooks.formula: No one prepared me for {topic}
examples: No one prepared me for this moment
No one prepared me for this reality

hooks.formula: {topic} is living rent free in my head
examples: This song is living rent free in my head
This moment is living rent free in my head

hooks.formula: The way {topic} understood the assignment
examples: The way this AI understood the assignment
The way this brand understood the assignment

hooks.formula: This is my Roman Empire: {topic}
examples: This is my Roman Empire: this tech moment
This is my Roman Empire: this memory

hooks.formula: {topic} ate and left no crumbs
examples: This performance ate and left no crumbs
This design ate and left no crumbs

hooks.formula: Not {topic} being my new personality trait
examples: Not this show being my new personality trait
Not this trend being my new personality trait

hooks.formula: When {topic} gives main character energy
examples: When this person gives main character energy
When this moment gives main character energy

hooks.formula: {topic} is very demure, very mindful
examples: This aesthetic is very demure, very mindful
This approach is very demure, very mindful

hooks.formula: Don't skip this: {topic} explained in 60 seconds
examples: Don't skip this: AI explained in 60 seconds
Don't skip this: this news explained in 60 seconds

hooks.formula: Smash that like button if {topic} is your vibe
examples: Smash that like button if this is your vibe
Smash that like button if you relate

hooks.formula: The {topic} plot twist no one saw coming
examples: The election plot twist no one saw coming
The tech announcement plot twist no one saw coming

hooks.formula: {topic} just went from 0 to 100 real quick
examples: This situation just went from 0 to 100 real quick
This trend just went from 0 to 100 real quick

hooks.formula: POV: {topic} in your first ranked match
examples: POV: Valorant patch in your first ranked match

hooks.formula: The {topic} play that ended careers
examples: The CS2 clutch play that ended careers

hooks.formula: Day 1 vs Day 90 of {topic}. The glow up is real.
examples: Day 1 vs Day 90 of calisthenics. The glow up is real.

hooks.formula: If you skip {topic} you are not serious about gains
examples: If you skip leg day you are not serious about gains

hooks.formula: This {topic} recipe just changed my whole life
examples: This pasta recipe just changed my whole life

hooks.formula: If Gordon Ramsay saw this {topic} he would cry
examples: If Gordon Ramsay saw this steak he would cry

hooks.formula: {topic} is literally free money and nobody is paying attention
examples: High yield savings is literally free money and nobody is paying attention

hooks.formula: The {topic} strategy that turned $100 into passive income
examples: The dividend strategy that turned $100 into passive income

hooks.formula: The way {topic} just gave me chills. Put this on repeat.
examples: The way this chorus just gave me chills. Put this on repeat.

hooks.formula: {topic} is the song of 2026 and nobody can change my mind
examples: This track is the song of 2026 and nobody can change my mind

hooks.formula: The {topic} red flag nobody talks about in relationships
examples: The texting red flag nobody talks about in relationships

hooks.formula: POV: {topic} with your person and everything just makes sense
examples: POV: Sunday morning with your person and everything just makes sense

vocabulary.usage: Use to emphasize truth or seriousness: 'This AI is revolutionary, no cap'
Similar to no cap, emphasizes truth: 'This is the best tech I've seen, on god'
End of discussion, final statement: 'This is the future, periodt'
Did something exceptionally well: 'This design ate'
To do something amazingly: 'This brand is slaying the game'
Wild, chaotic, unpredictable: 'This announcement was unhinged'
Content that's addictive but mindless: 'This is pure brainrot and I love it'
Delusional but in a fun way: 'Am I delulu or is this actually genius?'
Charisma or charm: 'This AI has rizz'
A phase or period: 'We're in our tech era now'
Something that turns you off: 'This UI gives me the ick'
A great song or beat: 'This soundtrack is a bop'
Has a unique or special impact: 'This moment hits different'
Did exactly what was needed: 'This brand understood the assignment'
Someone who stands out or is the focus: 'Main character energy right here'
Something you think about constantly: 'This is my roman empire'
Random assortment of snacks as a meal: 'This content is girl dinner'
Modest, classy, reserved: 'Very demure, very mindful approach'
Call to action for engagement: 'Smash that like button if you agree'
Encourage viewer interaction: 'Drop a comment with your thoughts'
Call to subscribe: 'Hit subscribe for more content like this'
Create urgency: 'Don't skip this, it's important'
Keep viewers engaged: 'Watch till the end for the surprise'
Something spreading widely: 'This just went viral'
Became very popular suddenly: 'This video blew up overnight'
Became very popular or impressive: 'The internet went crazy over this'
Did something really well: 'They really cooked with this one'
Really good, delicious: 'This content is bussin'
Excellent, amazing: 'This edit is fire'
Somewhat, kind of: 'This is lowkey genius'
Very much, obviously: 'This is highkey the best thing ever'
Living in your mind constantly: 'This lives rent free in my head'
Can't stop thinking about it: 'This moment is living in my head'
Stylish outfit or appearance: 'Check out this luxury drip'
Agreement or confirmation: 'You want this? Bet.'
Assessing the mood or energy: 'Let's do a vibe check on this trend'
Expression of amazement: 'Sheesh, this is insane'
It has the vibe of: 'It's giving luxury, it's giving expensive'
Emphasize something notable: 'The way this video has me crying'
Admitting to something relatable: 'Not me watching this 10 times'
Made you laugh hard: 'This absolutely sent me'
Wild, out of control behavior: 'The comments are going feral'
Go outside, disconnect: 'Time to touch grass after this'
Spending too much time on the internet: 'This is peak chronically online behavior'
Fully focused and committed: 'I'm locked in on this project'
Good game — use at end of gaming content
Making a crucial play under pressure
Muscle/fitness progress
Personal record at the gym
The perfect food photography moment
Money earned without active work
Compound interest/growth effect
An exceptionally good song/track
Music that sounds incredibly good
Positive trait in a partner
Something that suddenly turns you off

tips: Lead with the most shocking or unexpected element
Use contrarian takes to stand out from mainstream coverage
Add personal reaction or hot take to make it relatable
Include why this matters to the viewer directly
Use current slang to make serious topics accessible
bestPractices: Fact-check before posting to maintain credibility
Include context in text overlay for quick understanding
Use dynamic cuts to maintain energy
End with a question to drive comments
Reference trending topics to ride algorithmic waves
avoidList: Being too formal or academic in tone
Overly long explanations without visual interest
Ignoring the emotional angle of the story
Making content too niche without broader appeal

tiktok: Use trending sounds related to news/reaction
Add on-screen text for key facts
Keep under 60 seconds for maximum retention
Use duet feature to react to other news coverage
youtubeShorts: Include 'breaking news' or 'latest update' in hook
Add subscribe reminder at the end
Use chapters/timestamps in description
Encourage viewers to watch full video on main channel

tips: Lean into the chaos and unpredictability
Mix unrelated concepts for comedic effect
Use exaggeration to amplify the absurdity
Rapid-fire editing keeps energy high
Self-aware humor about being unhinged
bestPractices: Commit fully to the bit, no half measures
Use unexpected sound effects and visual gags
Layer multiple absurd elements for compound humor
Reference internet culture and memes
Make it rewatchable with hidden details
avoidList: Making it too random without any structure
Making it too long and losing momentum

tiktok: Use TikTok-native effects like green screen creatively
Leverage trending sounds in unexpected ways
Duet with serious content to create contrast
Use text-to-speech for comedic timing
youtubeShorts: Quick cuts every 1-2 seconds for chaos
Use jump cuts to amplify manic energy
Layer multiple audio tracks for sensory overload
End with a freeze frame on the most absurd moment

tips: Showcase exclusivity and aspiration
Use high production value and smooth transitions
Focus on details and craftsmanship
Create desire through scarcity and status
Balance aspiration with relatability
bestPractices: Use cinematic camera movements and lighting
Highlight textures, materials, and quality
Include price points to create shock value
Show behind-the-scenes or unboxing moments
Use sophisticated music or ambient sounds
avoidList: Using shaky camera work or poor lighting
Forgetting to show the emotional appeal
Making it feel like an advertisement

tiktok: Use 'luxury haul' or 'luxury lifestyle' hashtags
Show contrast between luxury and everyday items
Include 'get ready with me' luxury format
Use slow-mo for dramatic reveals
youtubeShorts: Create mini-documentaries about luxury brands
Include 'watch till the end' for price reveals
Use comparison format: luxury vs budget
Add links to full reviews in description

tips: Build emotional arc within short timeframe
Use music to amplify emotional beats
Show vulnerability and authenticity
Create relatable moments viewers recognize
End with catharsis or resolution
bestPractices: Start with a hook that creates empathy
Use close-ups to capture genuine emotion
Include personal story or testimonial
Layer emotional music strategically
Give viewers permission to feel
avoidList: Ignoring content warnings for heavy topics

tiktok: Use emotional storytelling sounds
Include text overlay for accessibility
Use photo montage for memory/nostalgia content
Leverage duet feature for shared experiences
youtubeShorts: Use slower pacing for emotional moments
Include chapter markers for story beats
Add 'if you relate' call-to-action in comments
Use fade transitions for reflective tone

tips: Simplify complex concepts for broad audience
Show practical applications and use cases
Create sense of discovery and excitement
Use comparisons to everyday objects
Balance technical accuracy with accessibility
bestPractices: Lead with the most impressive feature
Use screen recordings with annotations
Include before/after demonstrations
Explain why it matters to average person
Add futuristic music or sound design
avoidList: Using too much jargon without explanation

tiktok: Use 'tech hack' or 'AI' trending hashtags
Show split-screen comparisons
Include 'wait for it' moments for reveals
Use fast-paced editing for tech demos
youtubeShorts: Include step-by-step tutorials in short format
Use picture-in-picture for reactions
Add 'link in description' for tools/resources
Create series of related tech tips

tips: Exaggerate expressions and movements
Use bright, saturated colors and bold outlines
Create character-driven narratives
Add sound effects for comedic timing
Make it visually dynamic and energetic
bestPractices: Use animation principles: squash, stretch, anticipation
Include visual gags in every frame
Create memorable character designs
Use looping animations for replay value
Add Easter eggs for rewatchability
avoidList: Making animation too slow or static
Using dull colors that don't pop on mobile
Forgetting to add personality to characters
Making text too small to read

tiktok: Use cartoon filters and effects creatively
Leverage animation trends and challenges
Add voiceover with exaggerated character voices
Use transitions that match cartoon physics
youtubeShorts: Create episodic content with recurring characters
Use consistent art style for brand recognition
Add end cards with character poses
Include bloopers or behind-the-scenes animation

tips: Show high-stakes moments and clutch plays
Use game audio and comms for authenticity
Focus on relatable gaming experiences
Capture reaction to insane moments
Create FOMO with exclusive content or updates
bestPractices: Lead with the most hype gameplay moment
Include rank/level context for credibility
Use fast cuts during action sequences
Add on-screen callouts for key plays
Mix pro gameplay with relatable fails
avoidList: Ignoring the emotional stakes of ranked
Making content too niche for one game only

tiktok: Use trending gaming sounds and memes
Show POV perspective for immersion
Include text overlay for play-by-play
Leverage duet feature for reaction content
youtubeShorts: Add rank progression in thumbnails
Include game title and context in hook
Use highlight reel format for montages
Link to full gameplay in description

tips: Show visible transformation and progress
Use motivational energy and music
Demonstrate proper form and technique
Create accountability and challenge culture
Balance aspiration with accessibility
bestPractices: Lead with before/after or progress shots
Include workout details and rep counts
Show both success and struggle moments
Use slow-mo for form demonstration
Add personal stats and milestones
avoidList: Forgetting to show the work behind results

tiktok: Use gym culture sounds and trends
Show day-in-the-life workout routine
Include transformation timeline overlays
Leverage challenge and accountability trends
youtubeShorts: Create workout tutorial series
Use split-screen for form comparison
Add PR celebration moments
Include link to full workout plan

tips: Capture the perfect money shot closeup
Use ASMR sounds and satisfying textures
Show the cooking process with quick cuts
Create desire through presentation
Make recipes accessible and simple
bestPractices: Lead with the final plated dish
Use overhead and closeup angles
Include ingredient list in text overlay
Show hands working for relatability
Add sizzle sounds and visual appeal
avoidList: Making process too complicated or long
Poor lighting that dulls the food
Forgetting to show the actual eating moment

tiktok: Use trending food sounds and remixes
Show quick recipe in under 60 seconds
Include taste test reaction at end
Leverage food trends and challenges
youtubeShorts: Create recipe series with consistent format
Use time-lapse for longer cooking
Add full recipe in description
Include chef tips and hacks

tips: Simplify complex concepts with examples
Show real numbers and tangible results
Create urgency with market timing
Use contrast between poor and rich mindset
Balance education with entertainment
bestPractices: Lead with dollar amounts or percentages
Use charts and graphs for visual proof
Include disclaimers for credibility
Show personal results or case studies
Add actionable steps viewers can take

tiktok: Use money mindset and hustle sounds

Include passive income strategy reveals
Leverage FinTok trends and debates
youtubeShorts: Create educational series on investing
Use comparison format: good vs bad money habits
Add links to resources in description

tips: Capture emotional reaction to the music
Use high-quality audio and visuals
Show discovery moments and reactions
Create nostalgia or new trend energy
Make it shareable for music lovers
bestPractices: Lead with the best drop or chorus
Use lyric overlays for singalong potential
Include artist credit and song title
Show genuine emotional response
Add visual effects that match the vibe
avoidList: Poor audio quality that ruins the song

Create green flag vs red flag debates

Make it conversation-worthy for comments
bestPractices: Lead with controversial or relatable take
Use couple POV or solo commentary format
Include real examples and scenarios
Show vulnerability and authenticity

avoidList: Being toxic or promoting unhealthy dynamics

patterns.name: hook-tension-payoff
structure: Open with shocking hook or question
examples: Hook: 'This AI can do WHAT?' → Tension: 'Watch what happens next' → Payoff: 'It just solved a 10-year problem'
Hook: 'Nobody saw this coming' → Tension: 'The reveal is insane' → Payoff: 'Here's what actually happened'

patterns.name: before-after
examples: Old tech vs new tech side-by-side
Person's reaction before and after learning news
Product before and after upgrade

patterns.name: countdown-listicle
structure: Announce the list topic and number
Save best for last as hook
examples: '3 things about AI that will blow your mind'
'5 luxury items that are actually worth it'
'Top 4 news stories everyone missed'

patterns.name: reaction
examples: Reacting to breaking news announcement
First time seeing new tech feature
Responding to viral moment

patterns.name: pov-narrative
structure: Set up POV scenario with text or voiceover
examples: 'POV: You just discovered this tech hack'
'POV: Finding out this news in real time'
'POV: When luxury shopping goes wrong'

patterns.name: story-time
examples: Story of how this tech was created
Personal story related to news event
Behind-the-scenes luxury brand story

patterns.name: comparison
examples: Old AI vs new AI capabilities
Luxury brand vs budget alternative
Two perspectives on same news story

patterns.name: transformation
examples: Tech tutorial showing skill progression
Emotional journey from struggle to success
Creative process from sketch to final animation

patterns.name: mystery-reveal
examples: 'Why is nobody talking about this feature?'
'The truth behind this viral moment'
'What really happened in this news story'

patterns.name: tutorial-hack
examples: Hidden AI feature most people don't know
Luxury shopping hack to save money
Tech tip to boost productivity
